sentences.en: Arlott squirrelled away books, pictures and porcelain plates.
sentences.cn: 阿洛特将书本、图片和瓷盘瓷碟都藏起来。

sentences.en: He assembled a rich trove of Chinese porcelain.
sentences.cn: 他收集了一批中国瓷器.

sentences.en: If you evaporate a little sea water on a porcelain dish ; on cooling, crystals of common salt will deposit on the sides of the dish.
sentences.cn: 如果你将少许海水放到瓷盘中蒸发,冷却后就会有普通食盐的结晶附着在盘的四周.

sentences.en: Place them in a jam jar, porcelain bowl, or other similar container.
sentences.cn: 将它们装入果酱罐、瓷碗或其他类似容器中。

sentences.en: The cabinets display seventeenth-century blue-and-white porcelain.
sentences.cn: 展柜中陈列着17世纪的青花瓷。

sentences.en: The cargo includes three thousand pieces of porcelain.
sentences.cn: 这批货物中包括三千件瓷器.

sentences.en: The porcelain is fine and glossy.
The porcelain vase is enveloped in cotton.
The shop sells a great variety of porcelain ware.
sentences.cn: 这家店铺出售品种繁多的瓷器.

sentences.en: There were lilies every-where in tall white porcelain vases.
sentences.cn: 高高的白色瓷瓶上绘满了百合花。

sentences.en: There were lilies everywhere in tall white porcelain vases.
sentences.cn: 高高的白色瓷瓶上绘满了百合花。

sentences.en: These porcelain plates have rather original designs on them.
sentences.cn: 这些瓷盘的花纹很别致.

sentences.en: To this class of substance belong mica, porcelain, quartz, glass, wood, etc.
sentences.cn: 属于这类物质的有云母 、 瓷器 、 石英 、 玻璃 、 木材等等.

sentences.en: Yes, it is. You like porcelain?

trans.tran_en: a hard shiny white substance that is used for making expensive plates, cups etc
